title: Stock Prediction Utility
description: This is an application that recieves the ticker from the user and predicts the future price of the stock using a machine learning model. The model is trained on the historical data of the stock. The user can also see the historical data of the stock in the form of a candlestick chart.

title: Food Purchasing Website
description: This was a class project that was focused on creating a website (both backend and frontend) that delivers a certain product. Currently the website is not hosted and the code is not public due to acadameic dishonesty, but I can provide a link to the code if requested.

title: OCR Glasses
description: A pair of glasses that usec Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to gather the words off a page and conveys the words to the reader through tts.

title: Robotics
description: I was on my highschool FTC Robotics team for 6 years and I was the captain for 3 years. We competed in competition every season and won one award.
